website_summaries.verdict: Overall a solid set with quality constructed components, though a bit pricier than similar sets.
pros: A tournament-ready set with hefty shoes that stand out for their chrome and brass plating that resists fading
Shoes and stakes have solid steel workmanship
Components, including a rule book, come in a sturdy nylon case
cons: A bit on the higher end of the price scale
Rare reports of damage upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Cast steel not solid steel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Special Olympics team. On our first outing with the new horseshoe set we broke 3 of the 4 horseshoes included. I was shocked as I thought they were solid and not merely cast. I did not expect them to bust in half. Of course I missed the return window so that is just hard earned money down the drain and I still have no horse shoes for my athletes to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: jill s

customer_reviews.title: Not official size
customer_reviews.text: After I bought these I did research and found out that these are not the size sanctioned by the horseshoe association or whatever they call themselves. I was disappointed to get a stake about 1/2", not 1" in diameter and the shoes seem cheap of course they are made in China. Spend a little more and get yourself an official setup, don't waste your money like i did.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stemmons

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars if it was an option 😩
customer_reviews.text: We received this set in April 15,2020. Three of the shoes have broken. I built a pit and filled with six bags of sand each but because the horseshoes are made of a very poor metal, they manage to break. I would give zero stars on all if I could. Thoroughly disappointing as this was an activity we were hoping to do often during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: nmcarey

customer_reviews.title: Good product, minor shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple really. Put the stakes in the ground and start throwing the shoes. The only two shortcomings for this are the stakes could be a little longer to anchor them in the ground better and after the shoes start hitting the sand, the colors will eventually look the same so you have to refer to the A and B label. Or you could paint them if you like. The travel case is nice though if you want to put it in a camper for mobility. I installed mine more permanently in the backyard. I may end up getting some longer pieces of rebar from the hardware store for the stakes but otherwise, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The bag is flimsy n tore with in 20 seconds of use. The horseshoes handle seems chipped upon arrival I had to sand it down. Not impressed with the set. After using it a while I wish I didn’t get the PAinted set. They just don’t RING as loud. When you hit the stake
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hall

customer_reviews.title: thinking they all snap in place and won't rattle around like they would in a bag
customer_reviews.text: Quality set of horseshoes and stakes, but I bought this set specifically for the case, thinking they all snap in place and won't rattle around like they would in a bag. The case arrived already broken, really cheap plastic not strong enough to support the weight of its contents. And the items don't snap in they more so just sit in place. I would return due to the broken case, but I need these for the upcoming weekend. Product shipped fast and no issues with the seller, just not a quality case as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Great horseshoe kit! Bought this for my boyfriends birthday and he is in love with it. Great quality, comes with good directions on how to install in your yard and how to play (evernthought we knew how to). we built this in our backyard and the horseshoes were a really nice quality and finish. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vihs

customer_reviews.title: great product, lousy storage bag
customer_reviews.text: great purchase but would have liked a better way to store them, the bag they come in is very flimsy and will not last. would have been better with a nylon bag or stronger. the product is very havy and the storage bag for them is equal to that of a cheap cloth shopping bag you get for $1 at the Dollar store
customer_reviews.author: Necie

customer_reviews.title: Fun beach game!
customer_reviews.text: We are always looking for games to play on the beach during the summer. This is perfect for all ages. It is definitely a go too for our summers on the beach. Heavy duty set. Product Details The Champion Sports steel horseshoe set comes with 2 solid steel, 24-in stakes, four, 2.5-lb horseshoes and a set of rules. It's all conveniently carried in the included heavy-duty plastic case. FEATURES 2 solid steel, 24-in stakes Four, 2.5-lb horseshoes Rules Heavy-duty plastic carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Review Nerd

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made solid steel horseshoes. The posts are more for being able to take in and out but if you are making a permanent court.. you might want to consider rebar or something easier to concrete in.. but this set is everything you need to have a reliable game of horse shoes season after season :)
customer_reviews.author: JKinGA

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our resort because the description says the the horse shoes are solid steel. Broke in half after a month of use. Not solid steel.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reider

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE QUALITY WE EXPECTED - MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: We thought the quality would be better. The carrying bag is thin and feels like it will tear easily and won't last. Additionally, forged into every horseshoe is "CHINA"....we didn't know this when we purchased them. Several other reviews show the horseshoes broken in halves
customer_reviews.author: B Family

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had the set for 2 months. The colors were not vibrant at all. It was hard to tell them apart from the beginning. Then the paint on the horseshoes washed off in the rain!! The poles are too short so they move a lot during play. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe game
customer_reviews.text: What a great set of horseshoes. Made very well, can’t wait to play. Also, delivered the next day. Unbelievable. That’s some great service right there
customer_reviews.author: Dot Lemire

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. But seems to be great quality from what I inspected when I received it. Throwing horseshoe is a family tradition with my side of the family!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: While I am very pleased with the quality product that I ordered. I must also say That the horse shoes extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SWallace

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Poles useless, horseshoes shoddy and one shoe broke in half.
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoes are breakable and poles are useless as they are way too short. This set is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Dad

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the initial excitement wasn’t long lasting. After one game the paint is chipped all over the horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoes fell apart within 2 days. Also, the stakes are too thin and short to be used. Best to buy 3' stakes at hardware store and purchase authentic (old) Royal horseshoes off eBay and you have a great product for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Really bad shoe.  Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 sets of these for our restaurant outdoor area. We received them 5 days ago and broke them out tonight to play a great game of shoes. This was the result on only the third game. The picture is the lady that threw it and broke it. We will be returning all three sets.
customer_reviews.author: robert laurence

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: bought for a Christmas gift game, i was happy to win it back. Can't wait for nice weather to play
customer_reviews.author: Emily Snell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty set. The real deal. Buy this and it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Professional looking
customer_reviews.text: We like this set of Championship Horseshoe set, very nice ,durable and Professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Played 2 games and on the third one the hot shoe split in half upon impact on the ground, seems to be made of some kind of compacted sand-looking metal on the inside. Certainly not solid metal. Was bummed but equally fascinated when trying to figure out the score and it appeared there was an extra horseshoe in the sand, but mainly bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: The bars and the shoes are both heavy weighted and appear to be of good quality. My only complaint with this product is ...
customer_reviews.text: This classic horseshoe set is everything you'd expect it to be. The bars and the shoes are both heavy weighted and appear to be of good quality. My only complaint with this product is that the carrying case is fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks Pausak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and nice weight
customer_reviews.text: This horseshoe set is very nice. The weight is very nice and the posts are also heavy-duty. Recommend for those who like to play a real competitive game.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Game
customer_reviews.text: The champion sport Horseshoe Set is well made, I would recommend it to everyone, great game for the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Ann Devlin

customer_reviews.title: This item broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a father's day present for my husband and he has said it was the worst father's day present ever. He has only used it a few times a week in the last month and one of the horseshoes broke as shown in the picture. I would recommend purchasing a set from somewhere else as this set seems like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Darmanin

customer_reviews.title: Time to look for a better set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last Christmas to use during a camping trip New Years weekend, but it rained all weekend so I saved it for this year. There was no rain this year and the dirt was hard. During the first round of horseshoes one of them broke in half. I know the dirt was hard but it wasn't cement. Time to look for a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Greater than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was actually a lot nicer and better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandchildren and us too Keep our family bonding!🦔🦌🙆‍♀️🌸🦞🎄🎏
customer_reviews.text: Came real quick outside gift for grandchildren and us the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Vedrine

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday however we only got to play a couple of games before this happened sadly we are down to only 2 horseshoes since 2 have splint in half extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to h.o.a rules but great product fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Horseshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: The stakes are solid, strong and hold up well. The shoes are solid, great fit and are holding up well. The "carry" case broke before I used the shoes for the first time, That plastic just can't hold up to that kind of weight inside, but I don't really need the case anyways. I would definitely recommend the horseshoes, you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the very first throw
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY disappointed with these horseshoes. Gave them as a Christmas gift. the weather was nice enough to use them, I was informed that one broke with the very first toss. Don’t waste your money, look for a pair that are actually forged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I will need to do better research in the future to make sure I get ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product infrequently for one season and one of the horseshoe's is already broken. I thought I had purchased a quality product! I will need to do better research in the future to make sure I get what I paid for...
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Steel Horseshoes - Durable
customer_reviews.text: I was more than pleased. The horseshoes will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: B Newell

customer_reviews.title: Missing the stakes, delivered extremely late
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered late with a damaged box. The box was missing the "2 solid steel 20" stakes". Directed to a Champion Sports web site to resolve the problem. Then forced to select at least one star to rate the product. I truly rate it a ZERO.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 2 because the packaging was really nice. Comes in the carry case. But in the first hour a horse broke in half. Very cheaply made. Not worth it. Amazon customer service handled this issue really well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: One of the horseshoe actually broke during a game, ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the horseshoe actually broke during a game, it hit the wooden frame around the pit and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: so I started looking at different stores and Amazon had a great set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was having a family reunion and when our families would go on a picnic there was a horseshoe pit and the men would get together and play, so I started looking at different stores and Amazon had a great set for a great price. The set was sturdy and served the purpose. Everyone played and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Jett

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that I think is official for horseshoes
customer_reviews.author: Bernard A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids on sunny days
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kids on sunny days. The case works great so I can pack it up and take it anywhere from the backyard to the park to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Tatanka

customer_reviews.title: Broke after ONE GAME
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my brother. We finally had a chance to use them, and one broke right in half after playing a single game. I couldn't be more disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would rather throw a horse
customer_reviews.text: Well, they're made of metal I suppose. That's cool. I managed to get about 20 minutes out of them before one broke in half. If you are looking for horseshoes, you would be better off looking elsewhere. You will be disappointed. The plastic case they came in was nice though. Good enough for the return.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Martino

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set just for the shoes. The stakes are soo short that I recommend finding another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise!
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing horseshoes since I got this set for my boyfriend’s birthday. They are very durable. Instructions and scoring sheet have been very helpful. Love the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: On the first day we used these shoes, one broke in half. Are you kidding me? Should be solid iron and never break.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arnold

customer_reviews.title: ... been set up yet it looks well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and had not been set up yet it looks well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jesie12

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If i was smart and read the review i would have never bought these. 1st game played one of the shoes broke. I dont recommend them at all. What a waste of $40.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stoffel

customer_reviews.title: We love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: How can you know love a set of horseshoes. Good quality! BUy 'em and get out there and play!! We did!! Built horseshoe pits!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: God set of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great set of horseshoes. Only wish the steel rod was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Set will provide lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Good set with convenient carrying case. Price is a good value,
customer_reviews.author: Rms

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so well
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product so much we have ordered it for others as gifts yep in fact we have given it 2 times as a gift very durable and good quality, the case makes it nice to keep all gear together. Lots of family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Faye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is going to fun and different for my guest at my BBQ Backyard Cookout Birthday Party this month.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Not made to be outside or used
customer_reviews.text: Product flakes metal...crappy..hammered it down n top flaked...horseshoes do too

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: set up was easy (obviously), only complaint is that the case is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: j l

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Perfect game for outdoors and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability is an issue
customer_reviews.text: First time using the horseshoes. One of the horseshoes hit the peg and broke right in half? Please send me two more horseshoes(dark color not silver) IMMEDIATELY!
customer_reviews.author: jeff menard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The stobs are not long end to stay firmly in the ground

customer_reviews.title: They hold up better than the others we have used
customer_reviews.text: Have these at our rental house OBX ,They hold up better than the others we have used.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Especially for the price! Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Jones

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: bought because i thought the horse shoes would be durable,first time i used them they rusted. advertisement was very misleading
customer_reviews.author: John Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what i wanted for my party. It is a great set
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie Mazepa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for a company picnic and within an hour one of the horseshoes broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Second game of horse shoes one horse shoe broke in half we bought these on vacation with us very disappointed would not recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Larry dalton

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are not solid steel
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not solid steel, only the stakes. The shoes are caste iron and therefore very brittle and one broke after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half after one use!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! Bought this summer, but finally just used the set. After one game, the shoe hit the pole and completely broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Weetie

customer_reviews.title: Nice horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Nice horseshoe set! After several months use the only signs of wear are a couple chips in the paint. These have a nice, heavy weight to them and are perfect for outdoor get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and broke two of the shoes. Thought for the money it would be more durable
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Strohm

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR FAMILY FUN AND GET-TOGETHERS.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a person with any ability in sports but this I can handle. Very enjoyable and you really can improve your performance.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia johnson

customer_reviews.title: Truly Sturdy Horseshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty. Thought our grandchildren could play with this (ages 6 and 10) but they are still to small to handle them. I have put them away for the adults to play with until the grandchildren get a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Nana & Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I'd been wanting a decent horseshoes set for a while. The price was right on this set, though I still had some reservations about the quality. I went ahead and ordered it anyway. Upon inspection I was surprised by the overall quality, and after a few games, found it to be a great deal. If you want a good time at a lower price, this is a good deal. Don't expect professional quality, but don't expect to be disappointed either. Go ahead and get 'em, you know you want them.
customer_reviews.author: William Sawtelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We loved these and they were a big hit at our wedding. They were reasonably priced and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Confessore

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I will add pictures later however 3 of the horseshoes broke after using 4 times.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty set, perfect for adults. The carrying case is very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Poles are to short only go into ground 6inches. Everytime they get hit they move.
customer_reviews.text: Not professional in the least. Made in China junk cast with no hook to catch the pin

customer_reviews.title: They will last forever! Awesome gift game!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Heavy, durable! Last forever type of game! :)

customer_reviews.title: We will be purchasing a different item (made in the USA) for our picnic this year and hope for a better outcome.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 sets last year for a company picnic. These came as described and arrived on time, however, 1-2 horseshoes in 3 of the sets broke within hours of using them! We will be purchasing a different item (made in the USA) for our picnic this year and hope for a better outcome.

customer_reviews.title: Broke

customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Just as advertised! I would definitely purchase this product again and for the price. Way cheaper than the store.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Brass plating is gold paint and chrome ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Brass plating is gold paint and chrome plating is silver paint. Paint instead of plating should warrant a price reduction.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: The horse shoes are poorly made. One shoe broke on the very first game. Don’t buy! They are powdered metal.

customer_reviews.title: don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: Broke in half within 5 minutes. Not 100% steel. More like cast iron. I want my money back

customer_reviews.title: At first they seemed good, but on the 3rd time trip one horseshoe ...
customer_reviews.text: At first they seemed good, but on the 3rd time trip one horseshoe broke in half. They are made out of pot metal.

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: It is all that I remember from my youth; spending many hours of pitching horse shoes with family. Love the set. Great for backyard get together and family fun.

customer_reviews.title: Great horse shoe set
customer_reviews.text: Great horse shoe set! Only piece of advice is dont hammer the stakes in with a metal hammer, use a mallet

customer_reviews.title: Backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal compared to others online. We have already enjoyed playing horse shoes in our backyard and look forward to many more Summer fun times

customer_reviews.title: yaaay horse shoes.
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and not much to complain about, good purchace small carring case so easy to store. fun to play. loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our pet clydesdale will be the belle of the ball wearing these babies.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set of horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of horseshoes, heavy duty and the carrying case makes it easy to put away and travel with. We keep ours in our travel trailer.!
customer_reviews.author: A. Misfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: I received this in perfect condition. Everything was there including instructions. The case was not broken. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davis

customer_reviews.title: horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the horseshoe set the pins were very skinny and the Horseshoe broke on the second game their junk. Would like a refund and if you would like me to send them back a label to return them. At no cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I's a sturdy looking set
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet as we're still working on landscaping. But can't wait to play. I's a sturdy looking set.
customer_reviews.author: kmswo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and portable, with a case
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where customers are using these things that they are breaking... on concrete or out of an airplane at 30k perhaps??? We played with them for many hours while camping and they were fine.They seem plenty sturdy to me and having a case for it all (including a rule book) is great, since I carry it around with me in my RV. It's easy to set up and tons of fun. Keep in mind that without a backstop and a sand pit like a real horseshoe pit would have, it's a lot harder to score.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Strawn

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Horseshoe Set: Traditional Outdoor Lawn Game includes Four Professional Solid Steel Horseshoes with Solid Steel Stakes & Carrying Storage Case
product_meta.description: Play an authentic game of horseshoe in the backyard or at the campsite with the Champion Sports Steel Horseshoe Set. This complete set comes with standard weighted steel horseshoes and two solid steel stakes for traditional style play. Carry the game in the handy carrying case and liven up your next outdoor gathering.
feature_bullets: TOURNAMENT HORSESHOE SET Enjoy the classic backyard toss game with family and friends while you camp, tailgate, or bbq; Pair with games like bocce ball and corn whole for 3X the backyard or beach fun
SOLID STEEL HORSESHOES & STAKES Professional quality, regulation weighted metal horseshoe set includes 2 chrome plated and 2 brass plated solid steel pitching shoes and 2 durable metal stakes
HIGHEST QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP Unlike cheap plastic horseshoes, our plated shoes are made to last resisting rust and corrosion even after years of outdoor lawn games and all weather horseshoe pit play
WEATHER RESISTANT NYLON BAG Game sets include our custom heavy duty weatherproof case with YKK zipper & embroidered logo for easy transport and storage of your horseshoes in the car, truck, or van
INCLUDES COMPLETE SET OF OFFICIAL RULES Easy to follow instructions and rules makes gameplay simple and fun for kids and adult beginners alike; Set comes with everything you need to get started
